title: Iconic Hero Karizma makes a comeback after nearly a decade as the Karizma XMR
description: Hero MotoCorp has announced the return of its legacy model, the Karizma, after a nine-year hiatus. The new model, called the Karizma XMR, is priced at Rs 1.72 lakh. It is powered by a 210 cc liquid-cooled DOHC V4 engine and features a six-speed transmission. The bike has been updated with modern features such as an LCD instrument cluster, Bluetooth connectivity, and turn-by-turn navigation.
